title: Latest updates: Leicestershire Live on Wednesday 15 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: city into champions league last eight .
man who suffered cardiac arrest at match 'alive and recovering ' .
pair bailed over boy 's water park death .
wwe wrestlers set for music festival .
cricket : foxes sign ronchi for t20 blast .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return tomorrow from 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : mild evening ahead
text: largely clear skies with a few patches of cloud through this evening .
overnight skies will begin to gradually cloud over from the west .
a few patches of hill fog in prone spots .
minimum temperatures of 7c ( 45f ) .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: watch : race horse trainer suffers abuse after leicester meet
text: one of lawney hill 's horses recently crossed the line in third place at leicester .
what followed .
lawney describes as `` anger and bile '' from gamblers .
here 's her story
author: Lucy Bickerton
BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: murphy : no surprise tigers are in anglo-welsh final
text: leicester tigers assistant coach geordan murphy has praised his players for getting the club to sunday 's final of the anglo-welsh cup against exeter chiefs .
`` i do n't know why it should be a surprise that tigers are in the final , '' the former ireland international told bbc radio leicester .
`` credit to the players , they 've been really committed . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: ashby man identified following house 'stabbing '
text: police have formally identified a man found dead from stab wounds at a house in ashby-de-la-zouch on thursday 9 march .
he is 25-year-old warren hall of holland crescent in the town , leicestershire police said .
the force added the woman who was found inside suffering from serious stab wounds is 25-year-old sandie rayne , mr hall 's former partner .
police have also confirmed that they are not looking for anyone else in connection with the incident .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : march across leicestershire
text: thank you to linda williams for getting in touch via facebook to send in these of bradgate park looking glorious in the spring sunshine .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: buffon : we do n't want to play leicester next
text: juventus do not want to play leicester in the quarter-finals of the champions league , according to the italian team 's keeper and captain gianluigi buffon .
the italian champions beat porto to reach the last eight , while the foxes also progressed by overcoming sevilla .
the italy captain , 39 , said : `` who do i prefer not to play ?
leicester .
`` they are a dangerous and passionate team who can cause trouble for opponents who take the initiative .
we would have everything to lose . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: new zealand international 'ca n't wait ' to get started with foxes
text: new zealand wicketkeeper-batsman luke ronchi has said it is `` an exciting time '' to be joining leicestershire , having signed for the entire t20 blast campaign .
he has previously played in england for somerset and .
warwickshire , .
as well as touring with new zealand .
`` it seems like an exciting time at the club with a few personnel changes and talented additions , '' ronchi said .
`` i love playing county cricket and ca n't wait to get started .
`` i hope i can make a difference both on and off the field and contribute to a successful campaign . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: tom foley to referee chiefs-tigers anglo-welsh final
text: premiership rugby tweets
match officials : @ twitterid v @ twitterid referee : tom foley assistant refs : ross campbell , roy maybank tmo : david sainsbury
pity its not @ twitterid to bring a bit of welsh & humour into the proceedings
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man who suffered cardiac arrest at match 'alive and recovering '
text: the family of leicester city fan who was taken ill last night ( see 11.47 ) have asked me to share this message .
he 's alive , recovering and asked `` did we win '' when he woke up .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator

documents.title: afternoon weather update : warm and bright
text: it should feel fairly warm for most of this afternoon with light winds and highs of 15c ( 59f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: concern leicester 's ex-service personnel group may shut
text: i 've been to the leicester senior service club where they are desperate for more ex-service personnel to join .
they are worried about not having enough members and will consider possible closure at their agm on sunday .
the group has been in existence for more than 40 years .
author: Simon Ward
East Midlands Today reporter

documents.title: wwe wrestlers set for return to download festival
text: performers from wwe wrestling are set to form part of the entertainment at this year 's download festival at donington park .
wrestlers including bobby rhode , aleister black , tye dillinger and kassius ohno will appear inside the ropes .
festival promoter dave bradley said : `` having wwe nxt at download is like seeing what happens when an unstoppable force meets an immovable object - you just know sparks are going to fly . ''
the download festival will take place at donington park from june 9 to 11 .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man suffers cardiac arrest at leicester v sevilla match
text: a man in his 50s was taken to hospital during last night 's leicester city game after suffering a cardiac arrest at the king power stadium .
ambulance crews were seen giving the man cpr in the east stand at about 20:45 after they found him unconscious and not breathing .
`` we worked closely with members of st john ambulance to resuscitate the patient who was then conveyed to leicester royal infirmary , '' a spokeswoman for east midlands ambulance service said .
author: Andy Trigg
BBC Radio Leicester newsreader

documents.title: today 's leicester mercury front page
text: leicester city 's champions league victory over sevilla is up there with some of the club 's greatest achievements , manager craig shakespeare said .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: 'bring on barcelona ' : a fan 's perspective on city 's greatest night
text: what a match .
i 've been to some big leicester games before but perhaps none bigger than last night .
inside the stadium the atmosphere was electric , with thousands of blue and white flags waving , the sevilla fans chanting , the let slip the dogs of war banner unfurled at the kop end .
then the real fun started - and what fun it was .
the noise from the crowd was immense but when morgan 's goal went in the noise went up another notch .
from then on the crowd barely stopped singing .
albrighton 's second , the sending off , the penalty save - the game had it all .
no title was decided last night , no cup handed out , but it 's hard to imagine a bigger game in the history of leicester city .
to quote the man who got us there `` we 're in champions league quarter finals man !
dilly ding , dilly dong '' .
bring on barcelona !
author: Oliver Wright
BBC Local Live at King Power Stadium, Leicester

documents.title: your questions : why have the stocks in oakham got five holes instead of four ?
text: thank you to derek cullen for getting in touch via your questions to ask : why have the stocks in oakham got five holes instead of four ?
i tried the local museum , who did n't know , so widened my research and have now managed to get you an answer , or , at least a possible explanation for their use .
`` five hole stocks are not uncommon although not many now survive , '' according to dr sarah richardson from the university of warwick .
she added : `` five hole stocks originate from roman times when the arms , legs and head were confined which was more a form of torture than a shaming punishment . ''
`` more likely with the oakham example is that juveniles or women could have both legs confined to one hole so they could not wriggle free .
sometimes men were also confined by one leg alone . ''
dr richardson believes more than one man could be detained at one time , probably on alternative sides .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : march across rutland
text: it was quite a sunset in rutland last night - and our bbc weather watchers were busy capturing it on camera .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pair bailed over charlie dunn water park death
text: a man and woman who were arrested in connection with the death of a five-year-old boy .
have been bailed by police .
charlie dunn , from tamworth , died in hospital after being found submerged in a lake at bosworth water park in leicestershire on 23 july .
the couple were arrested on sus of manslaughter by gross negligence and child neglect .
the man is aged in his 30s and the woman is in her 20s .
they were arrested in staffordshire .
an inquest into charlie 's death was opened and adjourned until april .

documents.title: breakingfoxes bolster t20 options with luke ronchi signing
text: leicestershire foxes have signed new zealand international wicketkeeper-batsman luke ronchi for the duration of the t20 blast .
ronchi , who has scored 1,619 t20 career runs , has been signed to replace sharjeel khan who is the subject of an ongoing anti-corruption investigation .
leicestershire head coach pierre de bruyn said : we 're delighted to sign luke , who will offer power and dynamism to our batting line-up .
`` he has played a lot of games around the world and his experience in the shortest format of the game will also help our youngsters . ''
ronchi has previously had spells in county cricket with warwickshire and somerset .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: city to learn quarter-final opponents on friday
text: leicester have some esteemed company in the final eight of european football 's elite club competition :
the foxes will find out who their next opponents are during friday 's draw .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather outlook
text: here is my weather forecast for wednesday
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: leicester city 's dreams of european glory remain alive
text: leicester city 's champions league adventure continues following a 2-0 win ( 3-2 on aggregate ) over sevilla at king power stadium .
goals from captain wes morgan and marc albrighton secured city 's place in the last eight .

in a dramatic late finish - samir nasri was sent off , kasper schmeichel saved a penalty from steven n'zonzi that could have taken the tie into extra time and sevilla boss jorge sampaoli was sent to the stands as tensions reached boiling point .
but the foxes held firm .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: good morning and welcome along to wednesday across leicestershire .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your and stories , then please get in touch via facebook , twitter or email .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
